data.text: So whatever you want to do in your life don't ever work. It don't overthink it. Do you realize your dream?

data.text: Trust me the question isn't can you handle the situation

data.text: No matter whose fault it is that something is broken if it's your responsibility to fix it

data.text: It's not your fault if your partner cheated and ruined your marriage, but it is for damn sure
